description.first: I'm a Fullstack developer, optimistic, transparent, and full of energy to contribute. Currently, I'm working as a Front End developer at House of CB.
description.second: With the mission of creating products that optimize processes and enhance user experience. Here's a summary of my work so far.

firstParagraph.text: is a leading British women's clothing brand, internationally acclaimed for its designer pieces. With over 40 stores worldwide and a strong presence on social media. I currently work as a Front End Developer in their
is a company dedicated to manufacturing and selling furniture. They wanted to build a portfolio showcasing their completed projects to enhance the credibility of the brand.

secondParagraph.otherText: using Next.js, React.js, TypeScript, and Sass. I handled every aspect of the page, from design to user experience. I conducted meetings with the client throughout the development process to showcase progress and ensure that we met their expectations and functional requirements.

watts.title: 25Watts
watts.subTitle: Front End Developer, Oct 2022 - Apr 2024

firstParagraph.otherText: team where I worked on creating websites, portfolios, ecommerce sites, blogs, and landing pages.

list: WordPress development with Elementor and WooCommerce.
Next.js development with React.js, TypeScript, Node.js, and Sass. Experience in consuming data from a REST API to process dynamic information on the site.
Implementation of email sending with Nodemailer. Form validations with reCaptcha v2 and v3. Integration of maps using the Google Maps API.
Development of components following design patterns, with a focus on quality and performance. Experience in implementing best practices.

secondParagraph.text: I learned the application of Agile methodologies - specifically Scrum. I am proficient in tools such as Jira, Figma, Docker, and Git workflow management.

firstParagraph.text: With over 700 hours of practice, I learned multiple technologies, applied them in real projects, participated in a group project using SCRUM methodology to develop an ecommerce platform, and completed an individual project consisting of a Single Page Application (SPA).

individualProyect.title: Individual Project:
individualProyect.description: I developed a Single Page Application (SPA) based on an external API of dogs, allowing dynamic pagination and manipulation through filtering and sorting functionalities.

grupalProyect.title: Group Project:
grupalProyect.description: It is a web application designed for buying and selling computer products. It features a shopping cart, Custom PC Builder, Wish List, product filtering and pagination. It also includes integration with Mercado Pago, user registration, and different roles for navigation.
